Tell us how you really feel, Grant. But perhaps Dan WoikeÂ of the Los Angeles TimesÂ summed it up best.Â Me to a NBA front office guy - "I don't get the Kings." NBA front office guy - "No one does." â Dan Woike (@DanWoikeSports) February 20, 2017
